products.name: Radiance Vitamin C Serum

reviews.name: Maya
reviews.text: Brightened my skin in 2 weeks. Love the texture!

reviews.name: Arjun
reviews.text: Good serum but takes time to show results.

reviews.name: Priya
reviews.text: Absolutely glowing skin. Worth every rupee.

products.shortDesc: Lightweight serum for glow and even tone.
products.longDesc: A nourishing Vitamin C serum with stabilised formula that brightens, evens skin tone, and reduces signs of aging. Packed with antioxidants for radiant, healthy skin.

products.name: Hydra Boost Moisturizer

reviews.name: Kavya
reviews.text: Great for dry skin but wish it came in a bigger size.

products.longDesc: A gel-cream moisturizer infused with hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture and keep skin plump, smooth, and dewy all day long.

products.name: Soft Reset Foaming Cleanser

reviews.name: Ishaan

reviews.name: Sneha
reviews.text: Gentle and effective, but I prefer non-foaming.

reviews.name: Aarav
reviews.text: Perfect for sensitive skin. No irritation at all.

products.shortDesc: Gentle cleanser for all skin types.
products.longDesc: A pH-balanced foaming cleanser that removes impurities, makeup, and excess oil without stripping skin's natural moisture. Leaves skin clean, soft, and refreshed.

products.name: Invisible Shield SPF 50

reviews.name: Karan
reviews.text: Lightweight and non-greasy. Best sunscreen ever.

reviews.name: Meera
reviews.text: Great protection but reapplication can feel sticky.

products.shortDesc: Lightweight SPF 50 with no white cast.
products.longDesc: Broad-spectrum SPF 50 sunscreen with PA++++ protection. Lightweight, non-greasy formula that leaves no white cast. Perfect for daily use under makeup.

reviews.text: Effective detox mask. Use it once a week.

products.shortDesc: Deep cleansing mask for oily skin.
products.longDesc: A purifying clay mask with kaolin and bentonite clay to draw out impurities, minimize pores, and control excess oil. Perfect weekly treatment for clearer skin.

reviews.text: Love how it depuffs my under eyes instantly.

products.longDesc: A revitalizing eye cream with caffeine and peptides to reduce dark circles, puffiness, and fine lines. Brightens and firms the delicate under-eye area.
